summary.span: 當目錄或目錄內的檔案變更時，接聽 (Listen) 檔案系統變更告知並引發事件。

span.span: Listens to the file system change notifications and raises events when a directory, or file in a directory, changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用監看的指定目錄中的變更。Use to watch for changes in a specified directory. 您可以監看的檔案和指定之目錄的子目錄中的變更。You can watch for changes in files and subdirectories of the specified directory. 您可以建立要監看檔案的本機電腦、 網路磁碟機或遠端電腦上的元件。You can create a component to watch files on a local computer, a network drive, or a remote computer. 若要觀看的所有檔案中的變更，請設定屬性設為空字串 ("") 或使用萬用字元 ("\*。\*")。To watch for changes in all files, set the property to an empty string ("") or use wildcards ("\*.\*"). 若要觀看的特定檔案，設定屬性設為檔案名稱。To watch a specific file, set the property to the file name. 例如，若要觀看 MyDoc.txt 檔案中的變更，請設定"MyDoc.txt"的屬性。For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the property to "MyDoc.txt". 您也可以觀看某種類型的檔案中的變更。You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file. 例如，若要監看的文字檔案中的變更，將屬性為"\*.txt"。For example, to watch for changes in text files, set the property to "\*.txt". 有數種您可以監看目錄或檔案中的變更。There are several types of changes you can watch for in a directory or file. 例如，您可以觀看中的變更`Attributes`，則`LastWrite`日期和時間，或`Size`的檔案或目錄。For example, you can watch for changes in `Attributes`, the `LastWrite` date and time, or the `Size` of files or directories. 這是藉由設定屬性設為其中的值。This is done by setting the property to one of the values. 如需詳細資訊的變更類型可以觀看，請參閱。For more information on the type of changes you can watch, see . 您可以觀看的重新命名、 刪除或建立的檔案或目錄。You can watch for renaming, deletion, or creation of files or directories. 例如，若要觀看的文字檔案重新命名，設定屬性設為"\*.txt"，並呼叫方法其參數所指定。For example, to watch for renaming of text files, set the property to "\*.txt" and call the method with a specified for its parameter. Windows 作業系統會通知您有在緩衝區中所建立的檔案變更的元件。The Windows operating system notifies your component of file changes in a buffer created by the . 如果在短時間內有許多變更，緩衝區會溢位。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 這會導致遺失的目錄中，變更追蹤的元件，它只會提供地毯式通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 使用緩衝區的大小增加屬性很高，因為它來自無法空出給磁碟，所以還保留較少的緩衝區的非分頁記憶體大型足以不錯過任何檔案變更的事件。Increasing the size of the buffer with the property is expensive, as it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small yet large enough to not miss any file change events. 若要避免緩衝區溢位，請使用和屬性，如此您可以篩選掉不必要的變更通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the and properties so you can filter out unwanted change notifications. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 使用時，請注意下列類別。Please note the following when using the class. - 隱藏的檔案不會被忽略。Hidden files are not ignored. - 在某些系統中，報告變更，使用簡短的 8.3 檔案名稱格式的檔案。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如，"LongFileName.LongExtension 」 的變更無法回報為 「 LongFil ~。Lon"。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFil~.Lon". - 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端或衍生的類別不具有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). - 您可以設定的大小上限屬性透過網路監視的目錄是 64 KB。The maximum size you can set for the property for monitoring a directory over the network is 64 KB. > [!NOTE] > 執行在 Windows 98 不支援。Running on Windows 98 is not supported. ## 複製和移動資料夾Copying and moving folders 作業系統和物件解譯剪下和貼上動作或 move 動作的資料夾和其內容重新命名動作。The operating system and object interpret a cut-and-paste action or a move action as a rename action for a folder and its contents. 如果您剪下並將資料夾與檔案貼到正在監看資料夾物件會報告為新的資料夾，但不是包括其內容因為基本上只重新命名。If you cut and paste a folder with files into a folder being watched, the object reports only the folder as new, but not its contents because they are essentially only renamed. 若要收到資料夾的內容已移動或複製到監看的資料夾中，提供和事件處理常式方法下, 表中的建議。To be notified that the contents of folders have been moved or copied into a watched folder, provide and event handler methods as suggested in the following table. |事件處理常式Event Handler|處理的事件Events Handled|執行Performs| |-------------------|--------------------|--------------| ||, , , , |報告檔案屬性、 建立的檔案和已刪除的檔案中的變更。Report changes in file attributes, created files, and deleted files.| |||列出舊和新的路徑重新命名的檔案和資料夾，如有需要請展開以遞迴方式。List the old and new paths of renamed files and folders, expanding recursively if needed.| ## 事件和緩衝區大小Events and Buffer Sizes 請注意，數個因素會影響哪些檔案系統變更會引發事件，如以下所述：Note that several factors can affect which file system change events are raised, as described by the following: - 常見的檔案系統作業可能會引發多個事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 比方說，當檔案移到另一個、 數個目錄之間和某些和可能引發事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移動檔案簡單的多個作業所組成的複雜作業，因此會引發多個事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同樣地，某些應用程式 （例如，防毒軟體） 可能會導致所偵測到的其他檔案系統事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . - 可以觀看磁碟，只要它們不會切換，或移除。The can watch disks as long as they are not switched or removed. 不會引發事件的 Cd 與 Dvd，因為時間戳記和屬性無法變更。The does not raise events for CDs and DVDs, because time stamps and properties cannot change. 遠端電腦必須安裝之元件正確運作所需的平台之一。Remote computers must have one of the required platforms installed for the component to function properly. - 如果有多個物件所監看 Windows XP Service Pack 1 之前相同的 UNC 路徑，或 Windows 2000 SP2 或更早版本，則只有其中一個物件，則會引發事件。If multiple objects are watching the same UNC path in Windows XP prior to Service Pack 1, or Windows 2000 SP2 or earlier, then only one of the objects will raise an event. 在機器上執行 Windows XP SP1 和更新版本中，Windows 2000 SP3 或更新版本或 Windows Server 2003，所有物件將會引發適當的事件。On machines running Windows XP SP1 and newer, Windows 2000 SP3 or newer or Windows Server 2003, all objects will raise the appropriate events. 請注意，可能會遺失超過緩衝區大小時的事件。Note that a may miss an event when the buffer size is exceeded. 若要避免遺失事件，請遵循這些指導方針：To avoid missing events, follow these guidelines: - 藉由設定增加緩衝區大小屬性。Increase the buffer size by setting the property. - 避免監看檔案具有長檔名，因為長檔名的層面得以填滿緩衝區。Avoid watching files with long file names, because a long file name contributes to filling up the buffer. 請考慮重新命名這些檔案，使用較短的名稱。Consider renaming these files using shorter names. - 保留您的事件處理程式碼越短越好。Keep your event handling code as short as possible. ## Examples 下列範例會建立監看在執行階段指定的目錄。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 元件會設定為監看的變更`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`時間、 建立、 刪除或重新命名的目錄中的文字檔案。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果變更、 建立，或刪除檔案，檔案的路徑會列印至主控台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重新命名檔案時，新舊路徑列印到主控台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法查看遠端電腦沒有 Windows NT 或 Windows 2000。You cannot watch a remote computer that does not have Windows NT or Windows 2000. 您無法監看遠端的 Windows NT 4.0 電腦從 Windows NT 4.0 的電腦。You cannot watch a remote Windows NT 4.0 computer from a Windows NT 4.0 computer. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||位元 OR 組合`LastWrite`， `FileName`，及 `DirectoryName`bitwise OR combination of `LastWrite`, `FileName`, and `DirectoryName`| ||`false`| ||"\*.\*"（監看所有檔案。）"\*.\*" (Watch all files.)| ||`false`| ||81928192| ||空字串 ("")empty string ("")| > [!NOTE] > 元件將無法觀賞到指定的目錄設定，並是`true`。The component will not watch the specified directory until the is set, and is `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立監看在執行階段指定的目錄物件。The following example creates a object to watch the directory specified at run time. 中的變更的物件會監看`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`時間，同時建立、 刪除或重新命名的文字中的檔案目錄。The object watches for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` times, and for the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果變更、 建立，或刪除檔案，檔案的路徑會顯示到主控台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file displays to the console. 當檔案已重新命名時，則會在對主控台顯示的舊和新路徑。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths display to the console. 這個範例會使用和命名空間。This example uses the and namespaces. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Changed As FileSystemEventHandler

Attribute.AttributeName: System.IO.IODescription("Occurs when a file/directory change matches the filter")

summary.span: 發生在指定 內的檔案或目錄變更時。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對大小變更時引發事件時，系統屬性、 上次寫入時間、 上次存取時間或檔案或目錄的安全性權限的受監視的目錄中。The event is raised when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored. > [!NOTE] > 常見的檔案系統作業可能會引發多個事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 比方說，當檔案移到另一個、 數個目錄之間和某些和可能引發事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移動檔案簡單的多個作業所組成的複雜作業，因此會引發多個事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同樣地，某些應用程式 （例如，防毒軟體） 可能會導致所偵測到的其他檔案系統事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . 使用限制時處理這個事件引發的通知數目。Use to restrict the number of notifications raised when this event is handled. > [!NOTE] > 時檔案重新命名，但不是會在重新命名目錄時所引發非預期地引發事件。The event is raised unexpectedly when a file is renamed, but is not raised when a directory is renamed. 若要觀看重新命名，請使用事件。To watch for renaming, use the event. > [!NOTE] > 順序就會引發事件，與其他事件可能會變更時屬性不是`null`。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用事件，以監看的檔案變更時，對主控台顯示的檔案路徑。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is changed. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生在指定 內的檔案或目錄建立時。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些常見的相符項目，例如複製或移動檔案或目錄中，執行未直接對應到事件，但這些項目，並會造成要引發事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 當您複製檔案或目錄時，系統就會引發要將檔案複製，如果該目錄正在監看的目錄中的事件。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果您複製的目錄就正在由另一個執行個體所監看，就會引發任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如，您會建立兩個執行個體。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 設為觀看"C:\My Documents"，而 FileSystemWatcher2 設觀看 「 C:\Your 文件 」。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果您將檔案從 「 我的文件 」 複製到 您的文件 」， FileSystemWatcher2，將會引發事件，但不會引發事件的 FileSystemWatcher1。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 不同於複製、 移動檔案或目錄將會引發兩個事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory would raise two events. 上述範例中，如果將檔案從 「 我的文件 」 移到 您的文件 」，從FileSystemWatcher2 會引發事件和FileSystemWatcher1 會引發事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. > [!NOTE] > 常見的檔案系統作業可能會引發多個事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 比方說，當檔案移到另一個、 數個目錄之間和某些和可能引發事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移動檔案簡單的多個作業所組成的複雜作業，因此會引發多個事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同樣地，某些應用程式 （例如，防毒軟體） 可能會導致所偵測到的其他檔案系統事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . > [!NOTE] > 順序就會引發事件，與其他事件可能會變更時屬性不是`null`。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. 只要建立檔案時，就會引發事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果正在將檔案複製或傳送到監看的目錄中，事件會立即引發，後面接著一或多個事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. ## Examples 下列範例會使用事件，以建立監看的檔案時，對主控台顯示的檔案路徑。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is created. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 執行個體無法繼續執行監視變更時或在內部緩衝區溢位時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the instance of is unable to continue monitoring changes or when the internal buffer overflows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的引發的項目可防止從監視變更的物件。This event is raised whenever something prevents the object from monitoring changes. 例如，如果物件正在監視遠端目錄中的變更，而且該目錄的連線都會遺失，就會引發事件。For example, if the object is monitoring changes in a remote directory and the connection to that directory is lost, the event is raised. 系統會通知您的檔案變更，並將那些變更儲存在緩衝區中的元件會建立並傳遞至 Api。The system notifies you of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer that the component creates and passes to the APIs. 如果在短時間內有許多變更，緩衝區會溢位。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 這會導致遺失的目錄中，變更追蹤的元件，它只會提供地毯式通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加緩衝區的大小很高，因為它是來自非分頁記憶體無法空出至磁碟，因此保持越小越好的緩衝區。Increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, because it comes from non paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible. 若要避免緩衝區溢位，請使用， ，和篩選掉不必要的屬性變更通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the , , and properties to filter out unwanted change notifications. > [!NOTE] > 常見的檔案系統作業可能會引發多個事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 比方說，當檔案移到另一個、 數個目錄之間和某些和可能引發事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移動檔案簡單的多個作業所組成的複雜作業，因此會引發多個事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同樣地，某些應用程式 （例如，防毒軟體） 可能會導致所偵測到的其他檔案系統事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by .

The filter string.

value.span: 預設值是"\*。\*"（監看所有檔案）。

span.span: The default is "\*.\*" (Watches all files.)

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要觀看的所有檔案中的變更，請設定屬性設為空字串 ("")。To watch changes in all files, set the property to an empty string (""). 若要觀看的特定檔案，設定屬性設為檔案名稱。To watch a specific file, set the property to the file name. 例如，若要觀看 MyDoc.txt 檔案中的變更，請設定"MyDoc.txt"的屬性。For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the property to "MyDoc.txt". 您也可以觀看某種類型的檔案中的變更。You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file. 例如，若要監看的任何文字檔案中的變更，將"\*.txt"的屬性。For example, to watch for changes in any text files, set the property to "\*.txt". 使用多個篩選條件，例如"\*.txt|\*.doc"不支援。Use of multiple filters such as "\*.txt|\*.doc" is not supported. 之後，就可以變更屬性物件已開始接收事件。The property can be changed after the object has started receiving events. 如需有關篩選掉不想要通知的詳細資訊，請參閱， ，和屬性。For more information about filtering out unwanted notifications, see the , , and properties. 接受萬用字元相符的檔案，如下列範例所示。 accepts wildcards for matching files, as shown in the following examples. |篩選字串Filter string|監看下列的檔案Watches the following files| |-------------------|---------------------------------| |\*.\*\*.\*|所有檔案 （預設值）。All files (default). 空字串 ("") 也會監看所有檔案。An empty string ("") also watches all files.| |\*.txt\*.txt|副檔名為"txt"的所有檔案。All files with a "txt" extension.| |\*recipe.doc\*recipe.doc|結尾為 「 配方 」 與 「 文件 」 延伸模組的所有檔案。All files ending in "recipe" with a "doc" extension.| |win\*.xmlwin\*.xml|副檔名為"xml"開頭"win"的所有檔案。All files beginning with "win" with an "xml" extension.| |銷售 \* 200？。xlsSales\*200?.xls|符合下列項目：Matches the following:

銷售年 7 月 2001.xlsSales Aug 2002.xlsSales 年 3 月 2004.xlsSales July 2001.xlsSales Aug 2002.xlsSales March 2004.xls

但不符合：but does not match:

銷售年 11 月 1999.xlsSales Nov 1999.xls| |MyReport.DocMyReport.Doc|監看式唯一 MyReport.docWatches only MyReport.doc| ## Examples 下列範例會建立監看在執行階段指定的目錄。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 元件會設定為監看的變更`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`時間、 建立、 刪除或重新命名的目錄中的文字檔案。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果變更、 建立，或刪除檔案，檔案的路徑會列印至主控台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重新命名檔案時，新舊路徑列印到主控台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定要`true`當您想要監看的檔案和目錄包含在透過所指定的目錄內的變更通知屬性和其子目錄。Set to `true` when you want to watch for change notifications for files and directories contained within the directory specified through the property, and its subdirectories. 設定屬性設`false`有助於降低的通知傳送至內部緩衝區數目。Setting the property to `false` helps reduce the number of notifications sent to the internal buffer. 如需有關篩選掉不想要通知的詳細資訊，請參閱和屬性。For more information on filtering out unwanted notifications, see the and properties. 當`true`，是透過整個子樹狀結構，而不只是直屬子目錄遞迴。When `true`, is recursive through the entire sub tree, not just the immediate child directories. 中的檔案或目錄子樹狀結構中的相對路徑傳回屬性並屬性，取決於您所監看的變更。The relative path to a file or directory within the sub tree returns in the property of and the property of , depending on changes you are watching for. 您可以取得的完整的路徑屬性並屬性，取決於您所監看的變更。You can get the fully qualified path from the property of and the property of , depending on the changes you are watching for. 如果您正在觀賞，目錄的子樹狀目錄中會建立一個目錄並是`true`，自動會監看該目錄。If a directory is created in the sub tree of the directory you are watching, and is `true`, that directory will automatically be watched.

span.span: The internal buffer size in bytes.
The default is 8192 (8 KB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定緩衝區為 4 KB 或更大，但它不能超過 64 KB。You can set the buffer to 4 KB or larger, but it must not exceed 64 KB. 如果您嘗試設定捨棄屬性為小於 4096 個位元組，您的值和屬性設定為 4096 個位元組。If you try to set the property to less than 4096 bytes, your value is discarded and the property is set to 4096 bytes. 為了達到最佳效能，使用 Intel 架構的電腦上的 4 KB 的倍數。For best performance, use a multiple of 4 KB on Intel-based computers. 系統會通知檔案變更的元件，並將這些變更儲存在緩衝區中的元件會建立並傳遞至 Api。The system notifies the component of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer the component creates and passes to the APIs. 每個事件都可以使用最多 16 個位元組的記憶體，不包括檔案名稱。Each event can use up to 16 bytes of memory, not including the file name. 如果在短時間內有許多變更，緩衝區會溢位。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 這會導致遺失的目錄中，變更追蹤的元件，它只會提供地毯式通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加緩衝區的大小可以避免遺失檔案系統變更事件。Increasing the size of the buffer can prevent missing file system change events. 不過，增加緩衝區大小是昂貴，因為它來自無法空出給磁碟，所以讓緩衝區越小越好的非分頁記憶體。However, increasing buffer size is expensive, because it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible. 若要避免緩衝區溢位，請使用和篩選掉不必要的屬性變更通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the and properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以結合的成員監看的變更一次的一種以上類型的列舉。You can combine the members of the enumeration to watch for more than one type of change at a time. 例如，您可以在其中觀看變更檔案的大小，以及變更`LastWrite`時間。For example, you can watch for changes in size of a file, and for changes in the `LastWrite` time. 這會引發事件，只要變更檔案或資料夾的大小，或變更`LastWrite`檔案或資料夾的時間。This raises an event anytime there is a change in file or folder size, or a change in the `LastWrite` time of the file or folder. 這是一種方式篩選掉不必要的通知。This is one way to filter out unwanted notifications. 如需有關篩選掉不想要通知的詳細資訊，請參閱， ，和屬性。For more information on filtering out unwanted notifications, see the , , and properties. ## Examples 下列範例會建立監看在執行階段指定的目錄。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 元件會設定為監看的變更`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`時間、 建立、 刪除或重新命名的目錄中的文字檔案。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果變更、 建立，或刪除檔案，檔案的路徑會列印至主控台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重新命名檔案時，新舊路徑列印到主控台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更大小、 系統屬性、 上次寫入時間、 上次存取時間或檔案或目錄中的目錄受監視的安全性權限時呼叫。 is called when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored. 使用限制的事件數目的屬性時引發處理事件。Use the property to restrict the number of events raised when the event is handled. 只要建立檔案時，就會引發事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果正在將檔案複製或傳送到監看的目錄中，事件會立即引發，後面接著一或多個事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受監視的目錄中建立檔案或目錄時呼叫。 is called when a file or directory is created in the directory being monitored. 一些常見的相符項目，例如複製或移動檔案或目錄中，執行未直接對應到事件，但這些項目，並會造成要引發事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 當您複製檔案或目錄時，系統就會引發要將檔案複製，如果該目錄正在監看的目錄中的事件。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果您複製的目錄就正在由另一個執行個體所監看，就會引發任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如，您會建立兩個執行個體。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 設為觀看"C:\My Documents"，而 FileSystemWatcher2 設觀看 「 C:\Your 文件 」。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果您從 我的文件 複製檔案，並將它貼到 您的文件 」，中 FileSystemWatcher2，便會引發事件，但不會引發事件的 FileSystemWatcher1。If you copy a file from "My Documents" and paste it into "Your Documents", a event will be raised in FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 不同於複製、 移動檔案或目錄，將會引發兩個事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events. 上述範例中，如果將檔案從 「 我的文件 」 移到 您的文件 」，從FileSystemWatcher2 中，會引發事件和FileSystemWatcher1 中，會引發事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher1. 只要建立檔案時，就會引發事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果正在將檔案複製或傳送到監看的目錄中，事件會立即引發，後面接著一或多個事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刪除檔案或目錄，在受監視的目錄內時呼叫。 is called when a file or directory, within the directory being monitored, is deleted. 一些常見的相符項目，例如複製或移動檔案或目錄中，執行未直接對應到事件，但這些項目，並會造成要引發事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 當您複製檔案或目錄時，系統就會引發要將檔案複製，如果該目錄正在監看的目錄中的事件。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果您複製的目錄就正在由另一個執行個體所監看，就會引發任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如，您會建立兩個執行個體。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 設為觀看"C:\My Documents"，而 FileSystemWatcher2 設觀看 「 C:\Your 文件 」。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果您將檔案從 「 我的文件 」 複製到 您的文件 」， FileSystemWatcher2，將會引發事件，但不會引發事件的 FileSystemWatcher1。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 不同於複製、 移動檔案或目錄，將會引發兩個事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events. 上述範例中，如果將檔案從 「 我的文件 」 移到 您的文件 」，從FileSystemWatcher2 會引發事件和FileSystemWatcher1 會引發事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案或目錄內要監視的目錄已重新命名時呼叫。 is called when a file or directory within the directory being monitored is renamed. 其引數包含在重新命名作業，例如變更、 的舊和新的路徑，以及舊的和新名稱的類型的相關資訊。Its argument contains information about the renaming operation, such as the type of change, the old and new path, and the old and new name. 請注意，其屬性可能為 null 如果重新命名事件不會取得符合從作業系統的新舊名稱事件。Note that its property may be null for renamed events if the does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定要監看的目錄路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the directory to watch.
The path to monitor.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是目錄的完整的路徑。This is a fully qualified path to a directory. 如果屬性是`true`，此目錄是的根目錄的系統會監看的變更，否則為監看的唯一目錄。If the property is `true`, this directory is the root at which the system watches for changes; otherwise it is the only directory watched. 若要觀看的特定檔案，設定屬性的完整、 正確的目錄，而屬性設為檔案名稱。To watch a specific file, set the property to the fully qualified, correct directory, and the property to the file name. 屬性支援通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑。The property supports Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths. > [!NOTE] > 必須先設定這個屬性，該元件可以監看的變更。This property must be set before the component can watch for changes. 當目錄已重新命名時，自動將本身重新附加至剛重新命名的項目。When a directory is renamed, the automatically reattaches itself to the newly renamed item. 例如，如果您設定"C:\My Documents"的屬性，然後手動重新命名 [C:\Your 文件] 目錄元件仍會繼續接聽剛重新命名的目錄上的變更通知。For example, if you set the property to "C:\My Documents" and then manually rename the directory to "C:\Your Documents", the component continues listening for change notifications on the newly renamed directory. 不過，當您尋求屬性，其中包含舊的路徑。However, when you ask for the property, it contains the old path. 這是因為此元件可讓您判斷監看基礎控制代碼，而不是目錄的名稱。This happens because the component determines what directory watches based on the handle, rather than the name of the directory. 重新命名並不會影響此控制代碼。Renaming does not affect the handle. 因此，如果您終結的元件，並再重新建立它，而不需要更新屬性，您的應用程式會失敗，因為目錄不存在。So, if you destroy the component, and then recreate it without updating the property, your application will fail because the directory no longer exists. ## Examples 下列範例會建立監看在執行階段指定的目錄。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 元件會設定為監看的變更`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`時間、 建立、 刪除或重新命名的目錄中的文字檔案。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果變更、 建立，或刪除檔案，檔案的路徑會列印至主控台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 重新命名檔案時，新舊路徑列印到主控台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生在指定的 內的檔案或目錄重新命名時。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is renamed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Renamed`事件是具有下列簽章的委派：The `Renamed` event is an delegate that has the following signature: ```csharp public delegate void Renamed(object sender, RenamedEventArgs e); ``` ```vb Public Delegate Sub RenamedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As RenamedEventArgs) ``` 物件會提供重新命名作業，例如重新命名類型的相關資訊 (屬性)，舊的和新名稱，而舊的和新的路徑。The object provides information about the renaming operation, such as the type of the rename (the property), the old and new name, and the old and new path. 請注意，屬性可能為 null 如果重新命名事件不會取得符合從作業系統的新舊名稱事件。Note that the property may be null for renamed events if the does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system. 重新命名您所監看的目錄將不會引發通知。Renaming the directory you are watching will not raise a notification. 如您所監看的目錄內的項目，才會引發通知。Notifications are only raised for entries inside the directory you are watching. ## Examples 下列範例會使用對主控台顯示的檔案路徑，每當監看的檔案已重新命名的事件。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is renamed. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已`null`，方法處理， ， ，和系統執行緒集區的執行緒上呼叫事件。When is `null`, methods handling the , , , and events are called on a thread from the system thread pool. 如需有關系統執行緒集區的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on system thread pools, see . 當， ， ，以及事件會由 visual 的 Windows Form 元件，例如，透過系統執行緒集區中存取元件可能無法運作，或可能會導致例外狀況。When the , , , and events are handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a , accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or may result in an exception. 藉由設定避免這至 Windows Form 元件，這樣會使處理的方法， ， ，和元件建立所在的相同執行緒上呼叫的事件。Avoid this by setting to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods that handle the , , , and events to be called on the same thread on which the component was created. 如果使用於內部[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]在 Windows Form 設計工具中，會自動將包含的控制項為。If the is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, automatically sets to the control that contains the . 比方說，如果您放置Form1 設計工具上 (繼承自)屬性設為 Form1 的執行個體。For example, if you place a on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from ) the property of is set to the instance of Form1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會等候直到第一項變更，就會發生，並且接著會傳回。This method waits indefinitely until the first change occurs and then returns. 這是使用相同與`timeout`參數設定為-1。This is the same as using with the `timeout` parameter set to -1. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可讓事件處理常式被叫用來回應檔案的變更，即使屬性設定為`false`。This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the property is set to `false`. 在某些系統中，報告變更，使用簡短的 8.3 檔案名稱格式的檔案。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如，"LongFileName.LongExtension 」 的變更無法回報為 「 LongFi ~。Lon"。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會等到發生變更，或它已逾時。值為-1`timeout`參數表示無限期等候。This method waits until a change occurs or it has timed out. A value of -1 for the `timeout` parameter means wait indefinitely. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可讓事件處理常式被叫用來回應檔案的變更，即使屬性設定為`false`。This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the property is set to `false`. 在某些系統中，報告變更，使用簡短的 8.3 檔案名稱格式的檔案。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如，"LongFileName.LongExtension 」 的變更無法回報為 「 LongFi ~。Lon"。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".
